mapper.select: select a.iss_title, b.iss_yn , ac.pname as p_name, ac.mdate as m_date from issue a, issue_readyn b ,(select a.m_no, a.iss_no as ino, c.p_name as pname, a.m_date as mdate from medi_reco a, com_reco b, patient c where a.m_no = b.m_no and a.p_no = c.p_no and b.com_no in (select a.com_no from com_reco a, co_med b, co_doctor c where a.co_no = b.co_no and b.co_no =c.co_no and c.d_id=#{dId} and b.co_ing_status='1' and c.paty_yn='Y')) ac where a.iss_no=b.iss_no and a.iss_no = ac.ino

select c.d_name, b.m_name, a.com_date,d.ma_name from com_reco a, medi_reco b, doctor c, major d where a.m_no= b.m_no and c.d_id = b.d_id and c.ma_no=d.ma_no and a.com_no in ( select a.com_no from com_reco a, co_med b, co_doctor c where a.co_no = b.co_no and b.co_no =c.co_no and c.d_id=#{dId} and b.co_ing_status='1' and c.paty_yn='Y') order by 3 desc

select distinct b.d_id,g.iss_yn, e.p_name, e.p_rnum, d.m_date,d.m_no,d.m_name from co_med a, co_doctor b, medi_reco d , patient e, issue f, issue_readyn g where b.d_id = #{dId} and b.paty_yn='Y' and a.co_doc=b.d_id and a.co_no = b.co_no and b.d_id =d.d_id and d.p_no = e.p_no and f.iss_no = d.iss_no and f.iss_no = g.iss_no order by 4 desc

select distinct a.d_id ,d.iss_yn,b.p_no,b.p_name,b.p_rnum, a.m_date,a.m_no,a.m_name from medi_reco a,patient b, issue c, issue_readyn d where a.d_id in (select distinct d_id from co_doctor where co_no in (select co_no from co_doctor where d_id= #{dId} and paty_yn = 'Y')) and a.p_no = b.p_no and a.iss_no = c.iss_no and c.iss_no = d.iss_no order by a.m_date DESC
select b.iss_title, b.ISS_CONTENT from medi_reco a, issue b where a.iss_no = b.iss_no and a.m_no = #{mNo}
select b.p_name, b.p_rnum from medi_reco a, patient b where a.p_no = b.p_no and a.m_no = #{mNo}

select distinct a.d_id ,d.iss_yn,b.p_no,b.p_name,b.p_rnum, a.m_date,a.m_no,a.d_name from medi_reco a,patient b, issue c, issue_readyn d where a.p_no = b.p_no and a.iss_no = c.iss_no(+) and c.iss_no = d.iss_no(+) and a.m_no in (select m_no from com_reco a where a.co_no in( select co_no from co_doctor where d_id= #{dId} and paty_yn = 'Y')) order by a.m_date DESC
